mapper.select: SELECT id, device_id AS deviceId, controller_id AS controllerId, `name`, connect, sn FROM `t_device`
SELECT id, line_id AS lineId, line_no AS lineNo, line_version AS lineVersion, line_status AS lineStatus, `name` FROM `t_line` WHERE did = #{did}
SELECT a.id, a.line_id AS lineId, a.line_status AS lineStatus, a.status, b.`name` as dname FROM `t_line` a LEFT JOIN t_dept b ON a.dept_id = b.id
SELECT a.line_no as lineNo, b.controller_id AS controllerId FROM `t_line` a LEFT JOIN t_device b ON a.did = b.id where a.dept_id = #{deptId}
SELECT id, line_id AS lineId, line_no AS lineNo, line_version AS lineVersion, line_status AS lineStatus, `name` FROM `t_line` WHERE line_id = #{lineId}

SELECT id, lid, voltage, current, temp, leakage, power, `status`, IFNULL(energy,0) as energy, append_time as appendTime FROM `t_line_realtimingdata` WHERE lid = #{lid} and to_days(append_time) = to_days(now())
